${modID}:InfiniteUpgradeAttack.NAME: Not Searing Blow
${modID}:InfiniteUpgradeAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL _ _ _ NL !${modID}:Keyword! NL ${modID}:Multiword_Keywords NL Deal !D! damage X+!M! times.

${modID}:MultiVarCard.NAME: Many Variables
${modID}:MultiVarCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !${modID}:D2! damage. NL Deal !${modID}:D3! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !${modID}:B2! Block.

${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Why Byrd
${modID}:ExampleCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !${modID}:beep! HP. Byrds lose twice as much.
